biotools.summary:
Reproducible and Extensible Open-Source Software for Plant Phenological Phase Duration Prediction and Mapping.

PPMaP is a software for plant phonological phase prediction and mapping. This work was implemented by the International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center (CIMMYT) as part of TAMASA (Taking Maize Agronomy to Scale) project in collaboration with IITA and IPNI.

bioschemas.name: PPMaP
